Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Open the item availability page to search for available items.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies by which period amounts are displayed.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how amounts are displayed. Net Change: The net change in the balance for the selected period. Balance at Date: The balance as of the last day in the selected period.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the dates that will be used to filter the amounts in the window.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the customer number that will be used to calculate prices and discounts.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the location(-s) that will be used to filter the amounts in the window.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quantity filter that will be used to identify the available quantity.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the unit of measure in which available quantity is calculated.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies a number of the item.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies a description of the item.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the requested quantity is available in requested unit of measure.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the level of item availability.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the unit cost of the item on the line.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the price for one unit on the line.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the discount percentage that can be granted for the item on the line.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the price for one unit on the line including discount.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the currency code of the price on the line.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the search result finds a matching item against the searched query or alternative items.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the sum of the total demand for the item. The gross requirement consists of independent demand (which include sales orders, service orders, transfer orders, and demand forecasts) and dependent demand, which include production order components for planned, firm planned, and released production orders and requisition and planning worksheets lines.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the sum of items from replenishment orders. This includes firm planned and released production orders, purchase orders, and transfer orders.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quantity on planned production orders plus planning worksheet lines plus requisition worksheet lines.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the inventory level of an item.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the item's availability. This quantity includes all known supply and demand but does not include anticipated demand from demand forecasts or blanket sales orders or suggested supplies from planning or requisition worksheets.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the item's availability recalculated in specified Unit on Measure.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the item's Unit of Measure code.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the item's Unit of Measure description.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how many units of the item are inbound on purchase orders, meaning listed on outstanding purchase order lines.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how many units of the item are allocated to sales orders, meaning listed on outstanding sales orders lines.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how many units of the item are allocated to projects, meaning listed on outstanding project planning lines. The field is automatically updated based on the Remaining Qty. field in the Project Planning Lines window.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quantity of the items that remains to be shipped. The program calculates this quantity as the difference between the Quantity and the Quantity Shipped fields. It automatically updates the field each time you either update the Quantity or Quantity Shipped field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how many units of the item are allocated to assembly component orders.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how many units of the item are allocated to assembly orders, which is how many are listed on outstanding assembly order headers.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quantity of the items that are currently in transit.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quantity of the items that remain to be received but are not yet shipped. The program calculates this quantity as the difference between the Quantity and the Quantity Shipped fields. It automatically updates the field each time you either update the Quantity or Quantity Shipped field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quantity of the item that is expected to be in inventory at the end of the period entered in the Date Filter field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the quantity of the item that is currently in inventory and not reserved for other demand.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how many units of the item are scheduled for production orders. The program automatically calculates and updates the contents of the field, using the Remaining Quantity field on production order lines.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the sum of items from planned production orders.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the sum of items from replenishment order proposals, which include planned production orders and planning or requisition worksheets lines, that are calculated according to the starting date in the planning worksheet and production order or the order date in the requisition worksheet. This sum is not included in the projected available inventory. However, it indicates which quantities should be converted from planned to scheduled receipts.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the net change in the inventory of the item during the period entered in the Date Filter field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Show the information based on the previous period. If you set the View by field to Day, the date filter changes to the day before.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Show the information based on the next period. If you set the View by field to Day, the date filter changes to the day after.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View how the actual and the projected available balance of an item will develop over time according to supply and demand events.

Properties.Value:
"No." = field("No."),
                                      "Global Dimension 1 Filter" = field("Global Dimension 1 Filter"),

                                      "Variant Filter" = field("Variant Filter")

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Show the projected quantity of the item over time according to time periods, such as day, week, or month.

Properties.Name: RunPageLink
Properties.Value:
"No." = field("No."),
                                      "Global Dimension 1 Filter" = field("Global Dimension 1 Filter"),

                                      "Location Filter" = field("Location Filter"),

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or edit the item's variants. Instead of setting up each color of an item as a separate item, you can set up the various colors as variants of the item.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View availability figures for items on bills of materials that show how many units of a parent item you can make based on the availability of child items.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the total number of emails that the agent has received.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the total number of quotes that the agent has created. Both active and inactive quotes are included.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the total number of orders that the agent has created. Both active and inactive orders are included.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the total time saved by the agent on emails. The time saved is calculated based on the assumption that the agent saves 3 minutes per email.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the total time saved by the agent on quotes. The time saved is calculated based on the assumption that the agent saves 6 minutes per quote.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the total amount of all orders that the agent has created. Both active and inactive orders are included.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date and time when the record was last modified

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Opens the record if it exists.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or edit detailed information for the customers that you trade with. From each customer card, you can open related information, such as sales statistics and ongoing orders, and you can define special prices and line discounts that you grant if certain conditions are met.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or edit detailed information for the contacts that you trade with. From each contact card, you can open related information, such as sales statistics and ongoing orders, and you can define special prices and line discounts that you grant if certain conditions are met.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or edit the existing Sales Quotes.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Manage sales processes, view KPIs, and access your favorite items and customers.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Make offers to customers to sell certain products on certain delivery and payment terms. While you negotiate with a customer, you can change and resend the sales quote as much as needed. When the customer accepts the offer, you convert the sales quote to a sales invoice or a sales order in which you process the sale.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Make quotes, orders, and credit memos to customers. Manage customers and view transaction history.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
